original_text: With gladness and rejoicing shall they be brought: they shall enter into the king's palace.
korean_text: 그들은 기쁨과 즐거움으로 인도함을 받고 왕궁에 들어가리로다

sentences.original_text: With gladness and rejoicing shall they be brought:
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 기쁨과 즐거움으로 이끌려 올 것입니다:

sentences.original_text: they shall enter into the king's palace.
